english: What was the use of telling the whole ?
chinese: 把一切都说出来，有什么用呢？

english: You're letting prejudice carry you away .
chinese: 你是让偏见左右你的一切了。

english: I tried every cure you can think of .
chinese: 我试过了一切能想到的解脱办法。

english: All of it had educated and directed him .
chinese: 这一切都教育了和引导了他。

english: His conduct has been entirely above board .
chinese: 他的行为一切都是公开的。
一切造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I take every opportunity of speaking english .
chinese: 我利用一切机会讲英语。

english: Don't worry, all will turn out right .
chinese: 不用担心，一切都会如愿以偿的。

english: That's what life is all about-timing .
chinese: 人生一世，一切在于掌握时机。

english: I've been through it, and it is over .
chinese: 我已闯过来了，一切都结束了。

english: She told him all her terrible problems .
chinese: 她向他诉说了她的一切烦恼。

english: Up to now everything has been successful .
chinese: 到目前为止，一切都很顺利。

english: He took upon himself to order everything .
chinese: 他主动地忙着安排一切事物。
白丽莱茜从这一切事情中自拔出来了。

english: All this activity did bring its reward .
chinese: 这一切活动确实不是徒劳的。

english: Everything was turning out most satisfactory .
